column3: [' (StepDescription: Spiralize-Spiralize 1 medium zucchini into thin noodles using a spiralizer)']
[' (StepDescription: Heat-Heat a large pan on medium heat)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add 1 large minced garlic cloves to the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: Cook-Cook garlic until fragrant (about 1 minutes). Be careful not to burn garlic)']
[' (StepDescription: Cook-Cook for 2 minutes or until the zoodles are done)']
